item.title: Tree branches low and sharp, 2nd January
item.description:
The first big tree beside the path/bin has low branches which are sharp and have caught my face. It's also the path used by parkrun so multiple potential victims weekly where the tree could be the cause of injury.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Danson Lane, Welling, Greater London

item.title: Fly tipped rubbish dumped bag; now scattering around the area, 2nd January
item.description:
What looks like household rubbish has been dumped on the corner of the Registry Heights building /on the side road to Lewis House). The bag is now falling apart and its contents is starting to scatter around the area. Please get that bag Please ALSO pick up the litter scattered down the road to Lewis House Please ALSO pick up the litter scattered outside the Registry Heights building.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 34, Beckenham Road, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Icy bridge needs gritting, 2nd January
item.description:

item.title: Persistent dog fouling on Bayston Road, 2nd January
item.description:
Bayston Road is the target of dog fouling incidents; both of unbagged deposits left on the pavement and of bagged deposits left underneath trees. This occurs along the length of the street on both sides and has been a persistent problem for some years.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bayston Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
